{{{class="brush:c++"
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------
//function		:   laplace
//description	:   generate laplace distributed random numbers
//input			:   beta: parameter of laplace distributed
//return		:    
//others		:    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------
double laplace(float beta, long int *seed)
{
    double u1, u2, x ;
    u1 = uniform(0., 1., seed) ;
    u2 = uniform(0., 1., seed) ;

    if(u1 <= 0.5)
        x = -beta * log(1. -u2) ;
    else
        x = beta * log(u2) ;

    return x ;
}
}}}
